Package com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OnBazaarResponse
    An interface used to define callbacks for when a response to a request is received.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BazaarParams
    The base class for adding parameters to a BazaarRequest.
    BazaarRequest
    Sends and handles requests to the Bazaarvoice API.
    DisplayParams
    Bazaarvoice Conversations Display Request Parameters
    Media
    Contains byte data for a media object such as a photo or video; used internally for uploading media in a request.
    SubmissionMediaParams
    Handles the parameters for media submission.
    SubmissionParams
    Handles the parameters for content submission.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Media.MediaType
    An enum used for defining the type of media associated with an instance of Media.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BazaarException
    An exception type used for problems that arise in the use of the Bazaarvoice SDK.
